The Student Forum for participants in the High School Chapter
31  January,  2024
In coordination with the “Alwan Al Khair” Initiative, Best Buddies Qatar organized the first Student Forum for participants in the high school chapter, with the participation of approximately 80 female participants (from both categories) from all schools affiliated with the chapter for the academic year 2023/2024. The forum was held at the premises of Um Hakim Girls' Secondary School, as it is one of the chapter’s affiliated schools since 2016. The forum included a workshop discussing topics related to teamwork, volunteer work, and characteristics of successful teamwork.
